Class GameArenaWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameArenaWindow

  • public class GameArenaWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameArenaWindow class was created in order to develop a user interface which held the RiverCrossing game (GameArena), this was done using swing components such as a JFrame (Window) and JPanels (Menu Panel and Help Panel).
    Author:
    Andre Obamwonyi
    See Also:
    Driver, Player, GameArena

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameArenaWindow()
      This method is used to create the GameArena GUI, it displays the RiverCrossing game(GameArena) inside a window.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameArenaWindow

        public GameArenaWindow()
        This method is used to create the GameArena GUI, it displays the RiverCrossing game(GameArena) inside a window. The user is able to interact with the panel by clicking on different buttons corresponding wth various events. In addition, it displays the menuPanel (score and time) and it displays the help panel (instructions).
